Sentence.value: You were in the hospital to treat your breathing problems that are caused by interstitial lung disease.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You were in the hospital to treat your [[breathing problems|C1260922]] that are caused by [[interstitial lung disease|C0206062]].

Sentence.value: You received oxygen treatment, and you may need to keep using oxygen when you go home.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: You received [[oxygen|C0030054]] [[treatment|C0087111]], and you may need to keep using [[oxygen|C0030054]] when you go home.

Sentence.value: Ask your doctor whether you need to use oxygen during your activities, and if so, how much.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Ask your [[doctor|C0031831]] whether you need to use [[oxygen|C0030054]] during your activities, and if so, how much.
